data.trans_hint: Các đánh giá trong cuốn sách hướng dẫn này rất chủ quan, nhưng đọc cũng thú vị.
data.en_hint: The reviews in this guidebook are highly subjective, but fun to read.
data.content_game_1: The reviews in this guidebook are highly subjective, but fun to read.
data.answer_en_hint: The reviews in this guidebook are highly subjective, but fun to read.

data.trans_hint: Báo cáo khẳng định một cách tự tin rằng nền kinh tế sẽ tăng trưởng.
data.en_hint: The report asserts confidently that the economy will grow.
data.content_game_1: The report asserts confidently that the economy will grow.
data.answer_en_hint: The report asserts confidently that the economy will grow.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã trở thành phát thanh viên giỏi nhất trong những năm gần đây.
data.en_hint: He has became the best broadcaster for recent years.
data.content_game_1: He has became the best broadcaster for recent years.
data.answer_en_hint: He has became the best broadcaster for recent years.

data.trans_hint: Người đàn ông dám chắc rằng đấy không phải lỗi của mình.
data.en_hint: The man would contend that it was not his fault.
data.content_game_1: The man would contend that it was not his fault.
data.answer_en_hint: The man would contend that it was not his fault.

data.trans: Xuất sắc, xuất chúng, kiệt suất, lỗi lạc
data.trans_hint: Ông xuất chúng với tư cách là một nhà điêu khắc và một họa sĩ vẽ chân dung.
data.en_hint: He is eminent both as a sculptor and as a portrait painter.
data.content_game_1: He is eminent both as a sculptor and as a portrait painter.
data.answer_en_hint: He is eminent both as a sculptor and as a portrait painter.

data.trans_hint: Tập cuối cùng sẽ được chiếu vào tối nay.
data.en_hint: The final episode will be shown tonight.
data.content_game_1: The final episode will be shown tonight.
data.answer_en_hint: The final episode will be shown tonight.

data.trans: Đầu đề, tiêu đề, đề mục
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đăng câu chuyện dưới đề mục "Cuối cùng cũng về nhà!".
data.en_hint: We ran the story under the headline ‘Home at last!’.
data.content_game_1: We ran the story under the headline ‘Home at last!’.
data.answer_en_hint: We ran the story under the headline ‘Home at last!’.

data.trans: (+ of/to st) Quên, lãng quên, không nhớ tới
data.trans_hint: Cô dường như gần như lãng quên luôn đám đông phóng viên.
data.en_hint: She seemed almost oblivious to the crowds of reporters.
data.content_game_1: She seemed almost oblivious to the crowds of reporters.
data.answer_en_hint: She seemed almost oblivious to the crowds of reporters.

data.trans: (+ against/in favour of sb/st) Có thành kiến, có định kiến
data.trans_hint: Các nhà bảo vệ môi trường có định kiến không tốt về con đập.
data.en_hint: Environmentalists are prejudiced against the dam.
data.content_game_1: Environmentalists are Prejudiced against the dam.
data.answer_en_hint: Environmentalists are Prejudiced against the dam.

data.trans_hint: Kênh You Tube thu hút rất nhiều người xem.
data.en_hint: The You Tube channel attracts a lot of viewers.
data.content_game_1: The You Tube channel attracts a lot of viewers.
data.answer_en_hint: The You Tube channel attracts a lot of viewers.

data.trans: (+ about st/sb) Ngồi lê đôi mách, nói chuyện tầm phào
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta nói chuyện tầm phào về họ và ngược lại họ cũng vậy.
data.en_hint: We gossip about them and vice versa.
data.content_game_1: We gossip about them and vice versa.
data.answer_en_hint: We gossip about them and vice versa.
